title: Discrete Quantum Walk on a Circle (Balanced Coin)
subtitle: Discrete Quantum Walk on a Circle with a Balanced Coin
description: This demo implements a discrete quantum walk on a circle with a balanced (Hadamard) coin. It is the Qmod companion to the discrete quantum walk tutorial, showing the symmetric case where the coin produces an equal superposition of clockwise and counterclockwise steps.
friendly_name: Discrete Quantum Walk on a Circle (Balanced Coin)
